name: 6.3 and 6.4 "Little Carla Happy At Last" Multiple Choice Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Carla say she felt like?
questions.explanation:
puke.

	Carla was upset with Eddie. Carla was pregnant and Eddie still had not made a commitment to his role as the father.

questions.correct: "The cute little guy with the dents in his nose."
options: "The big lad with a strong upper jaw."
questions.explanation:
"The cute little guy with the dents in his nose."

	Rebecca was still getting to know the people that came to Cheers. She obviously remembered Eddie's nose and that was how she connected his name.

questions.text: Who claimed that Rebecca liked Mr. Drake?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Mr. Drake was Rebecca's boss whom she had a huge crush on. As the series went on, we saw that Rebecca tended to fall for rich men.

questions.text: What major superstition did Carla and Eddie break?
questions.correct: seeing the bride before the wedding
options: saying the real name of the "Scottish Play"
questions.explanation:
seeing the bride before the wedding.

	Eddie showed up at Cheers where Carla was and after that Carla believed they had nothing but bad luck.

questions.text: Carla was pregnant; what was she having?
questions.explanation:
twins.

	Eddie said, "Twins mean we're twice blessed." Later on, Carla said that maybe it wasn't because of bad luck, but perhaps they were having twins because the egg split.

Anthony and Annie.

	Anthony was Carla's oldest son. He got permission in an earlier episode to marry Annie when they were only 16 years old. He lost his job so he had to move back home with Carla.

Eddie's mother.

	Eddie's mother was played by Janet Brandt. She took one look at Carla and hated her instantly. She only spoke French and said she would never permit her son to marry this small mouse with the big stomach. Frasier said it either meant she wouldn't allow her son to marry her or she called her a small grapefruit.

questions.text: How much did Carla pay for her wedding dress?
questions.explanation:
$36.

	Sam wanted to get Carla and Eddie back together so he told her to try on her wedding dress. She agreed, saying it might be her last chance to wear one, then she said, "I'm out 36 bucks."

questions.text: Why wasn't Carla happy after she got married?
options: She and Eddie were still fighting.
She got injured during her wedding.
questions.explanation:
She wasn't married on time.

	She wanted to be married at 4:00 and they were pronounced man and wife at 4:01. Because of being so superstitious, she and Eddie believed their lives were doomed. That was until Eddie got a call saying he'd been fired. Carla realized he wasn't fired because of bad luck, he was fired because he didn't play well, and if that was the case maybe all the other bad things that happened were just a part of life.

questions.text: Why was Rebecca looking at Sam?
questions.correct: He had a really weird face.
options: He had spinach stuck between his teeth.
questions.explanation:
He had a really weird face.

	Rebecca said his "eyebrows grow together like a big ol' ugly caterpillar." Rebecca was pretty drunk by this point.
